mapper.insert:

id,
name,
price,
version,
create_time,
update_time,

update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
